City Council
============

Physical Address:

115 SW 1st St  
P.O. Box 460  
Mineral Wells, TX 76068

Phone:

[(940) 328-7702](tel:9403287702)

Fax:

(940) 328-7704

Link: [City Council](https://www.mineralwellstx.gov/index.aspx?nid=116)
